name: Dig wants a Fruit Gummy PC LAGGER
name_original: Dig wants a Fruit Gummy PC LAGGER
description: This is ONLY meant to lag older PCs. this will not lag on a gaming PC or gaming Laptop, but it is still kinda fun to use. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. THERE ARE FLASHING LIGHTS AND LOUD SOUNDS. (also running at 120 fps.) (credit to EmeraldLegend for DWFG Character)
